trans-unit.source: Provides an interface to retrieve an assembly or type by name.
trans-unit.target: 提供依名稱擷取組件或類型的介面。

trans-unit.source: This service is used to load types at design time.
trans-unit.target: 此服務用來在設計階段載入型別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the requested assembly.
trans-unit.target: 取得要求的組件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the assembly to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取的組件名稱。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the requested assembly, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no assembly can be located.
trans-unit.target: 要求的組件的執行個體或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果不可以位於任何組件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the requested assembly.
trans-unit.target: 取得要求的組件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the assembly to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取的組件名稱。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this method should throw an exception if the assembly cannot be located; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, and this method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the assembly cannot be located.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此方法應該擲回例外狀況，如果組件找不到。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>，而此方法傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果找不到組件。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the requested assembly, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no assembly can be located.
trans-unit.target: 要求的組件的執行個體或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果不可以位於任何組件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the path to the file from which the assembly was loaded.
trans-unit.target: 取得要從中載入的組件是檔案的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The name of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 組件的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The path to the file from which the assembly was loaded.
trans-unit.target: 從這個組件已載入檔案的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Loads a type with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 載入具有指定名稱的類型。

trans-unit.source: The name of the type.
trans-unit.target: 型別的名稱。

trans-unit.source: If the type name is not a fully qualified name that indicates an assembly, this service will search its internal set of referenced assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 如果型別名稱不是完整限定的名稱，指出組件，這項服務就會搜尋其內部的參考組件集。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref:System.Type> that corresponds to the specified name, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no type can be found.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體<xref:System.Type>對應於指定的名稱，或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果找不到任何型別。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Loads a type with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 載入具有指定名稱的類型。

trans-unit.source: If the type cannot be loaded and the `throwOnError` parameter is `true`, this will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果無法載入型別和`throwOnError`參數是`true`，這將會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The name of the type.
trans-unit.target: 型別的名稱。

trans-unit.source: If the type name is not a fully qualified name that indicates an assembly, this service will search its internal set of referenced assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 如果型別名稱不是完整限定的名稱，指出組件，這項服務就會搜尋其內部的參考組件集。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this method should throw an exception if the assembly cannot be located; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, and this method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the assembly cannot be located.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此方法應該擲回例外狀況，如果組件找不到。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>，而此方法傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果找不到組件。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref:System.Type> that corresponds to the specified name, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no type can be found.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體<xref:System.Type>對應於指定的名稱，或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果找不到任何型別。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Loads a type with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 載入具有指定名稱的類型。

trans-unit.source: If the type cannot be loaded and the `throwOnError` parameter is `true`, this will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果無法載入型別和`throwOnError`參數是`true`，這將會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The name of the type.
trans-unit.target: 型別的名稱。

trans-unit.source: If the type name is not a fully qualified name that indicates an assembly, this service will search its internal set of referenced assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 如果型別名稱不是完整限定的名稱，指出組件，這項服務就會搜尋其內部的參考組件集。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this method should throw an exception if the assembly cannot be located; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, and this method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the assembly cannot be located.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此方法應該擲回例外狀況，如果組件找不到。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>，而此方法傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果找不到組件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to ignore case when searching for types; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>型別，搜尋時忽略大小寫否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref:System.Type> that corresponds to the specified name, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no type can be found.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體<xref:System.Type>對應於指定的名稱，或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果找不到任何型別。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Adds a reference to the specified assembly.
trans-unit.target: 加入指定的組件的參考。

trans-unit.source: Once a reference to an assembly has been added to this service, this service can load types from names that do not specify an assembly.
trans-unit.target: 當組件的參考加入到此服務時，此服務可以載入型別不指定組件的名稱。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName> that indicates the assembly to reference.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName>，指出要參考的組件。</xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName>
